thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 3 of 1773
thread.title: Mel

author: Mel
title: Mel
text: I had been comparing flight prices from several different sites. This was the site that gave me the best price in Canadian Dollars. It was fast and simple. There was no extra fees I had to pay at the end. With most sites I've been on, it will tell you the price of the flight is so and so with taxes included, then when you get to check out, there's another 125 added to that price. With Flighthub, I got the price I was Quote: d for and nothing more.
